ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] tragedy
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello I will also add my prayers. Being closer to the tragedy (about 60 miles from D.C) I am truly devestaded and I fear that this may just be the beginning.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello I will also add my prayers. Being closer to the tragedy (about 60 miles from D.C) I am truly devestaded and I fear that this may just be the beginning. You may say oh you are only 14 and in 9th grade but I truely do not think it is over.




~+~Billy Simmons~+~
>From: "Whitmore, Lance"
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'"
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest] tragedy
>Date: Tue, 11 Sep 2001 16:03:54 -0400
>
>My thoughts and prayers go out to those who lost loved ones. Its a sad
>testimony of the cruelty of mankind.
>
>God help us,
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Amy Williams [mailto:amy_e_williams@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, September 11, 2001 3:34 PM
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] tragedy
>
>
>As are mine -
>
>I don't even know what to say
>
>I'm speechless at this horror
>
>Take care all
>
>Synthea Firestorm
>40 druidess - Sirens of the Storm
>Drinal
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Caro Holden
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Sent: Tuesday, September 11, 2001 1:08 PM
>Subject: [EverQuest] tragedy
>
>I just want to say to everyone on the list who has been affected directly or
>indirectly by today's terrible events that you have my thoughts and prayers,
>FWIW.
>
>Hugs
>Caro
>Dalura, Cleric of 40th lvl, Lanys T'vyl
